full_summary:
# Canada Post Corporation Tender Announcement

### Solicitation Information

* **Solicitation Title**: Collection Canada Annual Stamp Souvenir Collection Book
* **Solicitation Number**: Doc840705626
* **Publication Date**: November 17, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: January 19, 2024, 2:00 PM
* **Contracting Entity**: Canada Post Corporation


### Overview of Service Requirements

The Canada Post Corporation is seeking the provision of the Collection Canada Annual Stamp Souvenir Collection Book. This fully-colour, hard-cover publication features a slipcase showcasing Canada Post's stamps issued for one complete year. The book includes 80-100 pages of visuals and stories about each stamp, along with reproductions of the stamps with a mount for customers to display their own stamps. This contract will consist of the following responsibilities:

* Preparing and publishing the annual stamp souvenir collection book
* Including visual and textual information on the book's pages
* Providing a slipcase for protection and display purposes
* Delivering the end product within the specified timeframe

### Request for Proposal Information

* **Notice Type**: Public Tender
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Trade Agreements**: British Columbia Heinrich Treaty, Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* **Notice URL**: https://www.merx.com/public/solicitations/2688885607/abstract?language=EN

### Contact Information

* **Contact Person**: Tender Solicitation Control Officer
* **Email**: [tender.control@canadapost.ca](mailto:tender.control@canadapost.ca)
* **Phone**: 613-734-7863
* **Facsimile**: Not Available

### Delivery Address

* The end product must be delivered to the specified address within the designated timeframe.

This notice was last updated on: January 19, 2024
